amendment.description: Amendment requires the Director to submit a report to Congress on intelligence sharing with members of the EU and NATO regarding the travel of foreign fighters to and from Iraq and Syria and an analysis of the challenges impeding coordinated intelligence efforts.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 114-155 to require report on intelligence sharing with members of the EU and NATO regarding the travel of foreign fighters to and from Iraq and Syria and an analysis of the challenges impeding coordinated intelligence efforts.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Keating.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
